highlights.title: Volcanoes National Park
highlights.desc: Home of the mountain gorillas and golden monkeys. Gorilla trekking requires a permit and early booking.
tips: Wear waterproof boots and carry a light rain jacket.
Hire a porter to support local community.

highlights.title: Kigali Genocide Memorial
highlights.desc: A powerful and educational memorial about the 1994 Genocide against the Tutsi.

highlights.title: Lake Kivu
highlights.desc: Relaxing lakeside towns (Gisenyi/Rubavu, Kibuye/Karongi) with boat trips and beaches.

highlights.title: Nyungwe Forest
highlights.desc: Ancient rainforest with chimpanzee trekking and a famous canopy walk.
tips: Start treks early for best wildlife.
Leech socks or high socks recommended in rainy season.

highlights.title: Akagera National Park
highlights.desc: Savannah park with Big Five safaris and scenic lakes.
tips: Go for sunrise or late afternoon drives.

faqs.visa: Most visitors can apply online for an e-Visa. Check official sources for eligibility and latest fees.
faqs.currency: Rwandan Franc (RWF). Cards are accepted in cities; carry cash for rural areas.
faqs.best_time: June–September and December–February are generally drier; wildlife viewing is excellent year-round.
faqs.safety: Rwanda is widely regarded as safe for tourists. As always, use normal travel precautions.
faqs.health: Consult your doctor for vaccines and malaria prophylaxis. Use insect repellent and drink safe water.
faqs.sim: Local SIMs (e.g., MTN, Airtel) are inexpensive; bring passport for registration.
faqs.transport: Reliable intercity buses, private drivers, and car rentals. In Kigali, safe moto-taxis and ride-hailing operate.
faqs.permits: Gorilla trekking requires a permit; availability is limited and must be booked in advance.

1_day_kigali: Afternoon: Kimironko Market + Inema Arts Center
3_days_adventure: Day 1: Kigali city tour + drive to Musanze
Day 2: Gorilla trekking (or golden monkeys) in Volcanoes NP
Day 3: Lake Kivu relaxation (Rubavu) + return to Kigali
7_days_grand: Day 6-7: Nyungwe canopy walk + chimp trek, return to Kigali
